languages.text: {n}Череп нежно скалится.{/n} "Ты учишься видеть то, что сокрыто за привычной оболочкой. Продолжишь практику, и годами позже сможешь видеть истину даже с закрытыми глазами".
{n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."
languages.original_text: {n}Череп нежно скалится.{/n} "Ты учишься видеть то, что сокрыто за привычной оболочкой. Продолжишь практику, и годами позже сможешь видеть истину даже с закрытыми глазами".

traits.locale_text: {n}The skull is grinning gently.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practicing, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with the eyes closed."

{n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."

languages.text: {n}Der Schädel grinst freundlich.{/n} "Ihr lernt zu sehen, was sich hinter der vertrauten Hülle verbirgt. Übt weiter, dann werdet Ihr in einigen Jahren sogar mit geschlossenen Augen die Wahrheit erblicken."
languages.original_text: {n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Schädel grinst freundlich.{/n} "Ihr lernt zu sehen, was sich hinter der vertrauten Hülle verbirgt. Übt weiter, dann werdet Ihr in einigen Jahren sogar mit geschlossenen Augen die Wahrheit erblicken."

languages.text: {n}La calavera sonríe con benevolencia.{/n} «Está empezando a descubrir lo que se oculta tras la familiar fachada. Siga practicando y en unos años podrá ver la verdad aun con los ojos cerrados».
languages.original_text: {n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."

traits.locale_text: {n}La calavera sonríe con benevolencia.{/n} «Está empezando a descubrir lo que se oculta tras la familiar fachada. Siga practicando y en unos años podrá ver la verdad aun con los ojos cerrados».

languages.text: {n}頭蓋骨は穏やかな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「あなたは、見慣れた殻の奥に潜むものを見ようと学んでいる最中だ。練習を続ければ、数年後、目を閉じていても真実を見ることができるようになるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."

traits.locale_text: {n}頭蓋骨は穏やかな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「あなたは、見慣れた殻の奥に潜むものを見ようと学んでいる最中だ。練習を続ければ、数年後、目を閉じていても真実を見ることができるようになるだろう」

languages.text: {n}头骨露出了善意的微笑。{/n}“你正在学习如何看透熟悉的表象，看到藏在外壳之下的东西，继续坚持练习吧。若是能坚持几年，哪怕你闭上双眼，也一样能看到真相。”
languages.original_text: {n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."

traits.locale_text: {n}头骨露出了善意的微笑。{/n}“你正在学习如何看透熟悉的表象，看到藏在外壳之下的东西，继续坚持练习吧。若是能坚持几年，哪怕你闭上双眼，也一样能看到真相。”

languages.text: {n}Le crâne vous adresse un sourire bienveillant.{/n} « Vous commencez à voir ce qui se cache derrière les masques du quotidien. Continuez à vous entraîner, et dans quelques années, vous pourrez percevoir la vérité sans même ouvrir les yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le crâne vous adresse un sourire bienveillant.{/n} « Vous commencez à voir ce qui se cache derrière les masques du quotidien. Continuez à vous entraîner, et dans quelques années, vous pourrez percevoir la vérité sans même ouvrir les yeux. »

languages.text: {n}Kafatası, sevecen bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Aşina olduğun görüntünün ardında saklı olanı görmeyi öğreniyorsun. Alıştırmaya devam edersen seneler sonra gözlerin kapalıyken bile hakikati görebilecek hâle gelirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}The skull grins benignantly.{/n} "You are learning to see what is hidden behind the familiar shell. Keep practising, and years later you will be able to see the truth even with your eyes closed."
